short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that shows information about letters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Letterinfo shows you Unicode information about letters.

To show information about a letter, simply open the extension and enter one.

Alternatively, you can select any letter on any webpage you're currently viewing and open the extension then (with said letter selected).
